resources.string: Enable accessibility controls for the video player?
Your controls are modified because an accessibility service is on.

"GmsCore does not have permission to run in the background.
Follow the 'Don't kill my app!' guide for your device, and apply the instructions to your GmsCore installation.
This is required for the app to work."

"GmsCore battery optimizations must be disabled to prevent issues.
Disabling battery optimizations for GmsCore will not negatively affect battery usage.
Tap the continue button and allow optimization changes."
To receive notifications in RVX, enable Cloud Messaging.
GmsCore is not installed. Install it.

"DeArrow provides crowdsourced thumbnails for YouTube videos. These thumbnails are often more relevant than those provided by YouTube.
If enabled, video URLs will be sent to the API server and no other data is sent. If a video does not have DeArrow thumbnails, then the original or still captures are shown.
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow."
The URL of the DeArrow thumbnail cache endpoint.
Toast is not shown if DeArrow is unavailable.
Toast is shown if DeArrow is unavailable.
Show a toast if API is unavailable
Still captures are taken from the beginning, middle, or end of each video. These images are built into YouTube and no external API is used.
Using medium quality still captures. Thumbnails will load faster, but live streams, unreleased, or very old videos may show blank thumbnails.
Video time to take still captures from
Information is not appended to the timestamp.

"Information is appended to the timestamp.
Tap to configure the video quality or playback speed. Tap and hold to toggle the appended information type."
Ambient mode is disabled in battery saver mode.
Ambient mode is enabled in battery saver mode.
The domain to fetch images from.\nNote: Only enter the domain name, i.e., without the \"https\:\/\/\" prefix.
Using original image host.\n\nEnabling this can fix missing images that are blocked in some regions.

"Changes include:
Tablet layout • Community posts are hidden.
Automotive layout • Shorts open in the regular player. • Feed is organized by topics and channels. • Video description cannot be opened when 'Spoof streaming data' is turned off."
Live stream opens when the live ring is clicked.

"Channel opens when the live ring is clicked.
Limitation: When the Shorts live stream is opened in regular player due to the 'Open Shorts in regular player' setting, channel does not open."
Background color of the server-side snackbar has not changed.
Background color of the server-side snackbar has changed.

"Some snack bars use a theme defined on the server side, not the app theme.
Change the background color of these snack bars.
If there are server-side changes, the background color of the snack bar may not change."

"Start page always changes.
Limitation: Back button on the toolbar may not work."
List of component path builder strings to filter, separated by new lines.
Old style flyout menu is used.
Custom speeds must be less than %sx.
Add or change available playback speeds.
Player overlay opacity must be between 0-100.
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent.
Type the hex code of the seekbar accent color.
Type the hex code of the seekbar primary color.
To open YouTube links in RVX, enable Open supported links and enable all the Supported web addresses.
Default Shorts quality on mobile network
Default video quality on mobile network
Default Shorts quality on Wi-Fi network
Default video quality on Wi-Fi network
Disables ambient mode for fullscreen only.
Ambient mode is enabled in fullscreen.
Ambient mode is disabled in fullscreen.
Forced auto audio tracks are enabled.
Forced auto audio tracks are disabled.
Auto player popup panels are enabled.
Auto player popup panels are disabled.

"Auto switch mix playlists is enabled when autoplay is turned on.
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Autoplay / Playback → Autoplay next video"
Auto switch mix playlists is disabled.
Enabling this feature will disable automatic switching to YouTube Mix when playing music while autoplay is turned on.
Default playback speed is enabled for live streams.
Default playback speed is disabled for live streams.
Disable playback speed for live streams
Default playback speed is enabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for videos playable on YouTube Music.
Default playback speed is disabled if the video category is Music.
Video orientation follows device settings in fullscreen.
Video orientation is portrait mode in fullscreen.
Layout will be updated by the server.
Layout will not be updated by the server.

"App layout reverts to the layout it was using when it was first installed.
Some server-side layouts may not revert.
Changes include: • Components in the player flyout menu (or related settings) may not work. • Rolling numbers are not animated. • The Library tab is used. • The Music section of video description may not work. • Account switch button may not appear on the Library tab. Use the 'Enable wide search bar in You tab' setting."
Like and Dislike buttons will glow when mentioned.
Like and Dislike buttons will not glow when mentioned.
Disable Like and Dislike button glow

Continue watching will resume on app startup.

Info:
• Continue watching is the YouTube Premium feature.
• This setting does not force Continue watching to be enabled.
Continue watching will not resume on app startup.
Shorts player will resume on app startup.
Shorts player will not resume on app startup.
Chapters are enabled in the seekbar.
Chapters are disabled in the seekbar.
Fountain animation above the Like button is enabled.
Fountain animation above the Like button is disabled.

"Disable '2x>>' while holding down.
Note: • Disabling the speed overlay restores the Slide to seek behavior of the old layout. • Disabling this setting does not forcefully enable the speed overlay."
Swiping down below the player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping down below the player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (below the player)
Swiping up in the player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping up in the player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (in the player)
Swiping down in fullscreen will exit fullscreen mode.
Swiping down in fullscreen will not exit fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to exit fullscreen mode
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will change to the next / previous video.
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will not change to the next / previous video.
Status bar is opaque or translucent.
For some manufacturer ROMs running Android 12+, enabling this feature may make the system navigation bar transparent.

"Disables the following interactions when the video description is expanded:
• Tap to scroll. • Tap and hold to select text."

"VP9 codec is disabled.
Info: • Maximum resolution is 1080p. • Video playback will use more internet data than VP9. • VP9 codec is still used for HDR video."

"Gradient seekbar is enabled.
Side effect: Cairo theme is also applied to notification dots."
Controls overlay does not fill the fullscreen.
Debug logs do not include the buffer.
Spacing between navigation buttons is normal.
Spacing between navigation buttons is narrow.
Enables the OPUS codec if the player response includes it.
Do not save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen.
Save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen.

"This will restore thumbnails to live streams that do not have seekbar thumbnails.
Internet data usage may be higher, and seekbar thumbnails will have a slight delay before showing.
This feature works best with a very fast internet connection."
Custom actions are disabled in flyout menu.

"Custom actions are enabled in flyout menu.
Limitations: • Does not work with live stream."
Enable custom actions in flyout menu
Custom actions are disabled in toolbar.

"Custom actions are enabled in toolbar.
Press and hold the More button to show the Custom actions dialog."

"Timestamp is enabled.
Limitations: • This setting not only enables timestamps, but also allows users to hide the UI by clicking on the player background. • As this is a feature in the development stage by Google, the layout may be broken."

"Fullscreen brightness swipe is enabled.
Adjust brightness by swiping vertically on the left side of the screen."
Lowest value of the brightness gesture does not activate auto-brightness.
Lowest value of the brightness gesture activates auto-brightness.
Touch and hold to activate swipe gesture.

"Fullscreen seek swipe is enabled.
Seek the video by swiping horizontally on the top half of the screen."

"Fullscreen speed swipe is enabled.
Adjust speed by swiping horizontally on the bottom half of the screen."
Swiping up / down will not play the next / previous video.
Swiping up / down will play the next / previous video.

"Fullscreen volume swipe is enabled.
Adjust volume by swiping vertically on the right side of the screen."
Entering fullscreen when swiping down below the video player is disabled.
Entering fullscreen when swiping down below the video player is enabled.

"Enabling this setting will disable the Settings button in the You tab.
In this case, please use the following path to access the settings: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Wide search bar is disabled in the You tab.

"Wide search bar is enabled in the You tab.
To access settings, please use the following path: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Enable wide search bar in You tab

"Enabling this setting will disable the Settings button in the You tab.
In this case, you may need to use the following path to access the settings: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Wide search bar disables and uses the YouTube header space.
Wide search bar is enabled along with the YouTube header.
Enable wide search bar with header
Do not enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.

"Enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.
Limitation: Does not work if the player is minimized, in PiP mode, or in the background."
Enter fullscreen mode when video starts
Exit fullscreen mode at end of video
Video descriptions are not expanded automatically.
Restart to load the layout normally
Import settings from a saved file.
"%1$s is not installed. Please download %2$s from the website."
%s is not installed. Please install it.
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as YTDLnis.
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or YTDLnis, on long press.
Long press video downloader package name
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or YTDLnis.
Gemini API Key not set in ReVanced Extended settings.
No raw transcription data to parse
Translating with Gemini...\n\n⚠️ This step may fail if Gemini ignores the instructions or hits the limit.
Enable \"Display over other apps\" to show as subtitles
The font size of the transcribed video subtitles. To hide subtitle box, just tap on it.
Displays the optimization dialog for GMSCore at each application startup.
Gradient start and end positions from 0 to 1 separated by comma.
List of account menu names to filter, separated by new lines.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can only use \'Get YouTube Premium\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can use \'YouTube Premium\' or \'Premium\' as keywords.
"Hide elements of the account menu and You tab. Some components may not be hidden."

"Action buttons are hidden by identifier filter.
Info: • Right action buttons are hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves empty space."

"Action buttons are hidden by index.
Info: • Wrong action buttons may be hidden, or action buttons may not be hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves no empty space."
AI-generated video summary section is shown.
AI-generated video summary section is hidden.
Featured places, Games, Music and People mentioned sections are shown.
Featured places, Games, Music and People mentioned sections are hidden.
"Hides the following shelves: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Listen again • Shopping • Watch it again"
"Carousel shelves are hidden, such as: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Listen again • Shopping • Watch it again"
Links at the top of channel profiles are shown.
Links at the top of channel profiles are hidden.
List of channel tab names to filter, separated by new lines.
Create a Short button is shown.
Create a Short button is hidden.
Emoji and timestamp buttons are shown.
Emoji and timestamp buttons are hidden.
Comments by members banner is shown.
Comments by members banner is hidden.
Comments section is shown in home feed.
Comments section is hidden in home feed.
Hide Comments section in home feed
Shown in home feed and related videos.
Hidden in home feed and related videos.
Hide in home feed and related videos
How this content was made section is shown.
How this content was made section is hidden.
List of flyout menu names to filter, separated by new lines.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can only use \'Play next in queue\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can use \'Play next\' or \'in queue\' as keywords.
Feed flyout menu filter is disabled.
Feed flyout menu filter is enabled.

"Home / Subscription / Search results are filtered to hide content that matches keyword phrases.
Limitations: • Shorts cannot be hidden by channel name. • Some UI components may not be hidden. • Searching for a keyword may show no results."

Surrounding a keyword/phrase with double-quotes will prevent partial matches of video titles and channel names.

For example,
\"ai\" will hide the video: How does AI work?
but will not hide: What does fair use mean?
Videos in home feed are not filtered.
Videos in home feed are filtered.

"Keywords and phrases to hide, separated by new lines.
Keywords can be channel names or any text shown in video titles.
Words with uppercase letters in the middle must be entered with the casing (ie: iPhone, TikTok, LeBlanc)."
Videos in subscriptions feed are not filtered.
Videos in subscriptions feed are filtered.
Keyword is too short and requires quotes: %s.
Like and Dislike buttons are shown.
Like and Dislike buttons are hidden.
Live Chat messages are shown.\n\nThis setting applies to Shorts live videos too.
Live Chat messages are hidden.\n\nThis setting applies to Shorts live videos too.
Live Chat replay button is shown.\n\nIt appears in fullscreen when closing Live Chat.
Live Chat replay button is hidden.\n\nIt appears in fullscreen when closing Live Chat.

"Hide videos with less than 1,000 views from home feeds that have been uploaded from unsubscribed channels.
This filter may no longer work, use 'View count filter' instead."
Listen with YouTube Music menu is shown.
Listen with YouTube Music menu is hidden.

Stats for nerds menu is shown.
Stats for nerds menu is hidden.
Watch in VR menu is shown.
Watch in VR menu is hidden.
Explore the podcast section is shown.
Explore the podcast section is hidden.
This changes the size of the comments section, so it is impossible to open a Live Chat replay in the comments section.
This does not change the size of the comments section, so it is possible to open the Live Chat replay in the comments section.
Open mix playlist button is shown.
Open mix playlist button is hidden.

"Hides the following recommended videos:
• Videos with phrases such as 'People also watched' underneath."
More videos section in the quick actions container and the related video overlay are shown.
More videos section in the quick actions container and the related video overlay are hidden.

"This setting limits the maximum number of layouts that can be loaded on the player screen.
If the layout of the player screen changes due to server-side changes, unintended layouts may be hidden on the player screen."
Thumbnails in the search term history are shown.
Thumbnails in the search term history are hidden.
Chapter labels next to the seekbar are shown.
Chapter labels next to the seekbar are hidden.
Autoplay or Playback menu is shown.
Autoplay or Playback menu is hidden.

Billing and payments menu is hidden.

Manage all history menu is hidden.

Watch on TV menu is hidden.

Try experimental new features menu is hidden.

Purchases and memberships menu is shown.
Purchases and memberships menu is hidden.
Hide elements of the YouTube settings menu.
Video quality preferences menu is shown.
Video quality preferences menu is hidden.
Your data in YouTube menu is shown.
Your data in YouTube menu is hidden.

Disabled comments button or with label \"0\" is shown.
Disabled comments button or with label \"0\" is hidden.
"Floating buttons like 'Use this sound' are shown in the Shorts channel tab."
"Floating buttons like 'Use this sound' are hidden in the Shorts channel tab."
Full video link label is shown.
Full video link label is hidden.
Live Chat header is shown.\n\nBack button in header will not be hidden.
Live Chat header is hidden.\n\nBack button in header will not be hidden.
Play & Pause button background is shown.
Play & Pause button background is hidden.

"Hidden in channel.
Info: • Only shelves with the Shorts header on the home tab are hidden."
Shown in home feed and related videos.
Hidden in home feed and related videos.
Hide in home feed and related videos

"Hides Shorts shelves.
Side effect: Official headers in search results will be hidden."
Use this sound button is shown.
Use this sound button is hidden.

"This setting has been deprecated.
Instead, use the 'Settings → Autoplay → Autoplay next video' setting.
Note: • If you have any issues with 'Suggested video end screen', try restarting the app."
Suggested video end screen is shown.

"Suggested video end screen is hidden when autoplay is turned off.
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Autoplay / Playback → Autoplay next video"

"Home / Subscription / Search results are filtered to hide videos with views less or greater than a specified number.
Limitations: • Shorts cannot be hidden. • Videos with 0 views are not filtered."
Videos in home feed are not filtered.
Videos in home feed are filtered.
Videos in subscriptions feed are not filtered.
Videos in subscriptions feed are filtered.
Hide recommended videos with less than a specified number of views.\n\nKnown issue: Videos with 0 views are not filtered.
Videos with views greater than this number will be hidden.
Videos with views less than this number will be hidden.

Specify your language template for the number of views shown under each video in the user interface. Each key (a letter/word in your language) -> value (meaning of the key) must be on a new line. Keys go before "->" sign. If you change the app or system language you need to reset this setting.

Examples:
English: 10K views = K -> 1000, views -> views
Spanish: 10 K vistas = K -> 1000, vistas -> views

"YouTube Doodles show up a few days each year.
If a YouTube Doodle is currently showing in your region and this setting is on, the filter bar below the search bar will also be hidden."
Theme of the snack bar is not inverted.
Theme of the snack bar is inverted.
Keeps landscape mode when turning the screen off and on in fullscreen.
Videos play in portrait mode after turning the screen off and on.
Videos continue to play in landscape mode after turning the screen off and on.
The amount of milliseconds the landscape mode is forced after the screen in turned on.
Double-tap action and pinch to resize is disabled.

"Double-tap action and pinch to resize is enabled.
• Double tap to increase Miniplayer size. • Double tap again to restore original size."
Enable double-tap and pinch to resize

"Drag and drop is enabled.
Miniplayer can be dragged to any corner of the screen."
Expand and close buttons are shown.

"Buttons are hidden.
Swipe to expand or close."
Skip forward and back are shown.
Skip forward and back are hidden.

"Horizontal drag gesture enabled.
Miniplayer can be dragged off-screen to the left or right."
Miniplayer overlay opacity must be between 0-100.
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent.
Pixel size must be between %1$s and %2$s.
Initial on screen size, in pixels.
Opens links in the in-app browser.
Opens links in the external browser.
Do not open Shorts in the regular player.
Open Shorts in the regular player.
"Tap to toggle always repeat states. Tap and hold to toggle pause after repeat states."
"Tap to copy video URL. Tap and hold to copy video URL with timestamp."
"Tap to copy video URL with timestamp. Tap and hold to copy video timestamp."
Instead of launching an external downloader, open the queue manager.

"Parsing the video may take a while depending on its length. Transcribing long videos may exceed Gemini's limits.
AI-generated responses may contain inaccurate information.
Tap here to get an API key."

"Tap to summarize the video. Tap and hold to transcribe.
Summarized and transcribed results are saved unless you closed the app or used Gemini on another video. Tap the button again to view results."
Tap to mute volume of the current video. Tap again to unmute.
Tap and hold to change button state.
Unable to generate playlist due to channel id mismatch.

"Tap to generate a playlist of all videos from channel. Tap and hold to undo.
Info: • May not work on live streams."
"Tap to open speed dialog. Tap and hold to reset playback speed to 1.0x. Tap and hold again to reset back to default speed."
"Tap to open whitelist dialog. Tap and hold to open whitelist setting dialog.
Native playlist download button, if shown, opens the native in-app downloader.
Native playlist download button is always shown, and in public playlists, it opens your external downloader.
Native video download button opens your external downloader.
Native video download button opens the queue manager.
Native video download button opens the native in-app downloader.
Native video download button opens your external downloader.
YouTube Music is required to override button action. Tap here to download YouTube Music.
YouTube Music button opens the native app.
YouTube Music button opens the RVX Music.

"Instead of opening an external downloader, open the queue manager dialog.
You can also open the queue manager by pressing and holding the back button on the navigation bar.
This feature is still in progress, so most features may not work.
Please use it for debugging purposes only."
Quick actions top margin must be between 0-32.
Configure the spacing from the seekbar to the quick action container, between 0-32.
Playback speed changes only apply to the current video.
Playback speed changes apply to all videos.
A toast will not be shown when changing the default playback speed.
A toast will be shown when changing the default playback speed.
Playback speed changes only apply to the current Short.

"Playback speed changes apply to all Shorts.
Info: • The only way to change the playback speed in the Shorts player is to use the 'Speed ​​dialog' in 'Custom actions'. • If you didn't include the 'Shorts components' patch, this wouldn't be available."
Remember playback speed changes on Shorts
A toast will not be shown when changing the default playback speed on Shorts.
A toast will be shown when changing the default playback speed on Shorts.
Changed default Shorts playback speed to: %s.
Quality changes only apply to the current video.
Quality changes apply to all videos.
A toast will not be shown when changing the default video quality.
A toast will be shown when changing the default video quality.
Quality changes only apply to the current Short.
Quality changes apply to all Shorts.

"Removes the viewer discretion dialog. This does not bypass the age restriction. It just accepts it automatically."
Replaces the software AV1 codec with the VP9 codec.

Replaces the Create button with the Settings button.
"Tap to open YouTube settings. Tap and hold to open RVX settings."
"Tap to open RVX settings. Tap and hold to open YouTube settings."
Action type to assign to button
Seekbar thumbnails will appear in fullscreen.
Seekbar thumbnails will appear above the seekbar.
Old video quality menu is not shown.
Old video quality menu is shown.
Old player layout is not used.
"Old player layout is used. No margins on top and bottom of player."

"A YouTube Data API v3 Developer Key is required to replace handles with usernames.
The daily quota for API keys on the free plan is 10,000, and 1 quota is used to replace a handle with a username for 1 comment.
Click to see how to issue an API key."
The developer key for using the YouTube Data API v3.

1. Go to Create a new project.
2. Click the CREATE button.
3. Go to YouTube Data API v3.
4. Click the ENABLE button.
5. Click the CREATE CREDENTIALS button.
6. Select the Public data option.
7. Click the NEXT button.
8. Copy the API key.

※ API key should never be shared with others, so it is not included in Import / Export settings.
Issue YouTube Data API v3 developer key
Dislike data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more.
Like button styled for best appearance.
Like button styled for minimum width.
Dislikes are shown as a number.
Dislikes are shown as a percentage.
Reload video to vote using Return YouTube Dislike

"Dislikes are shown on Shorts.
Limitation: Dislikes may not appear if the user is not logged in or in incognito mode."
Toast is not shown if Return YouTube Dislike is unavailable.
Toast is shown if Return YouTube Dislike is unavailable.
Show a toast if API is unavailable
Sanitizes sharing links by removing tracking query parameters.
"Phrases like '#', 'Fundraiser', 'Shop' and 'products' are shown from the video subtitles."
"Phrases like '#', 'Fundraiser', 'Shop' and 'products' are hidden from the video subtitles."
Data is provided by the SponsorBlock API. Tap here to learn more and see downloads for other platforms.
Skip button displayed for entire segment.
Skip button hides after several seconds.
Skip button styled for best appearance.
Skip button styled for minimum width.
Create new segment button is not shown.
Create new segment button is shown.
SponsorBlock is a crowdsourced system for skipping annoying parts of YouTube videos.
Segment voting button is not shown.
Value must be a positive number.
Number of milliseconds the time adjustment buttons move when creating new segments.
The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server.
Segments shorter than this value (in seconds) will not be shown or skipped.
Skip count tracking is not enabled.
Lets the SponsorBlock leaderboard know how much time is saved. A message is sent to the leaderboard each time a segment is skipped.
Show a toast when skipping automatically
Toast is not shown. Tap here to see an example.
Toast is shown when a segment is automatically skipped. Tap here to see an example.
Video length minus the combined segment length is shown in parentheses next to the full video length.
Private user id must be at least 30 characters long.
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you.
Read the SponsorBlock guidelines before creating new segments.
Guidelines contain rules and tips for creating new segments.
Adjust: Mark Start and End Time for segment
The segment lasts from %1$02d:%2$02d to %3$02d:%4$02d (%5$d minutes %6$02d seconds)\nIs it ready to submit?

The segment is from

%1$s
to
%2$s

(%3$s)

Ready to submit?
Category is disabled in settings. Enable category to submit.
Do you want to edit the timing for the start or end of the segment?
Set %s as the start or end of a new segment?
Mark two locations on the time bar first.
Preview the segment, and ensure it skips smoothly.
Start must be before the end.
Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Does not include segments providing context or background details.
The part of the video that most people are looking for.
A short reminder to like, subscribe, or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should instead be under self promotion.
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, or repeating animation. Does not include transitions containing information.
Only for use in music videos. Sections of music videos without music, that aren\'t already covered by another category.
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information.
Collection of clips that show what is coming up or what happened in the video or in other videos of a series, where all information is repeated elsewhere.
Similar to Sponsor, except for unpaid or self promotion. Includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.
Paid promotion, paid referrals, and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shout-outs to causes / creators / websites / products they like.
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to RVX and other SponsorBlock platforms.
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported / exported to RVX and other SponsorBlock platforms. This includes your private user id. Be sure to share this wisely.

Your settings contain a private SponsorBlock userid.

Your user id is like a password, and it should never be shared.

That\'s %s of their lives.
Tap here to see the leaderboard.
Tap here to see the global stats and top contributors.
Tap here to view your segments.
Tap here to change your username
Unable to submit segment.\nRate Limited (too many from the same user or IP).

Toast is shown if SponsorBlock is unavailable.

"This feature is still experimental, so there is no guarantee that it will work perfectly.

Info:
• Shorts default playback speed should be enabled.
• The selected speed will be applied to the next video.
Meta panel bottom margin must be between 0-64.
Configure the spacing from the seekbar to the meta panel, between 0-64.
Configure the height percentage of the empty space left when the navigation bar is hidden, between 0 and 100 (%).
Press and hold the timestamp to change the Shorts repeat status.

"Shows the video title section in fullscreen.
Limitation: Video title disappears when clicked."
If autoplay is enabled, the next video will play after the countdown ends.
If autoplay is enabled, the next video will play immediately.

"Skips the preloaded buffer at the start of videos to immediately apply the default video quality.
Info: • When the video starts, there is a delay of approximately 0.3 seconds. • Does not apply to Shorts, HDR videos, live stream videos, or videos shorter than 15 seconds. • The 'Spoof streaming data' setting also removes preloaded buffers, so this setting is not needed if you use that setting."
Turning on this setting may cause video playback issues.
Speed overlay value must be between 0-8.0.

"Spoofing the client version to the old version.
• This will change the appearance of the app, but unknown side effects may occur. • If later turned off, the old UI may remain until clear the app data."
18.38.45 - Restore old default video quality behavior
18.48.39 - Disable views and likes from being updated in real time
19.13.37 - Restore old style Rolling number animations
19.26.42 - Disable Cairo icon in navigation and toolbar
19.33.37 - Restore old playback speed flyout panel
Type the spoof app version target.

"App version will be spoofed to an older version of YouTube.
This will change the appearance and features of the app, but unknown side effects may occur.
If later turned off, it is recommended to clear the app data to prevent UI bugs."

"Spoofs the device dimensions to the maximum value.
Info: • High quality may be unlocked on some videos that require high device dimensions, but not all videos. • This setting is not available if 'Spoof streaming data' is turned on."
Could not fetch any client streams.
You may not be logged in.
Video codec is forced to AVC (H.264).

"Enabling this might improve battery life and fix playback stuttering.
AVC has a maximum resolution of 1080p, Opus audio codec is not available, and video playback will use more internet data than VP9 or AV1."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available. • Disable forced auto audio tracks is not available. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available."
• There may be playback issues (PoToken required).
"• Videos may end 1 second early. • OPUS audio codec may not be supported."
• Whole ASNs/IP ranges may be blocked by the server.
"• Stable volume is not available. • Movies or paid videos may not play. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."

"Do not skip Onesie response encryption.
• Some users may experience a new type of playback issue."

"Skip Onesie response encryption.
• Fixes a new type of playback issue that some users are experiencing. • AV1 codec may not be available."
Client used to fetch streaming data is hidden in Stats for nerds.
Client used to fetch streaming data is shown in Stats for nerds.
"Streaming data is not spoofed. Video playback may not work."
iOS client not added to available clients.

"iOS client added to available clients.
WARNING: iOS client is deprecated. Any issues that arise while using it are at your own risk."

"When requesting YouTube API endpoints using iOS, you will need the Auth tokens issued by the iOS device and the PoTokens issued by iOSGuard.
This means that streaming requests via iOS will be missing both the Auth tokens and the PoTokens, and the server may consider the user as a bot and block the entire ASN/IP range.
USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!"
Turning off this setting may cause video playback issues.
Brightness swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for brightness swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).\nThe shorter the minimum distance, the faster the brightness level changes.
Swipe gestures are disabled in Lock screen mode.
Swipe gestures are enabled in Lock screen mode.
Swipe gestures in Lock screen mode
The threshold for a swipe to occur.
Swipeable area size cannot be more than 50.
Percentage of swipeable screen area.\n\nNote: This will also change the size of the screen area for the double-tap-to-seek gesture.
The text size in the swipe overlay.
The amount of milliseconds the overlay is visible.
Seek swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for seek swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).
Speed swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for speed swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).
The seek swipe gesture zone is at the top, the speed zone is at the bottom.
The speed swipe gesture zone is at the top, the seek zone is at the bottom.
Volume swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).

Configure the minimum distance for volume swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).

The shorter the minimum distance, the faster the volume level changes.

Recommended volume swipe sensitivity is 100% at 15-volume steps and 10% at 150-volume steps.

"Swaps the positions of the Create button with the Notifications button by spoofing device information.
• The device may need to be rebooted for a change of this setting to take effect. • Disabling this setting loads more ads from the server side. • You should disable this setting to make video ads visible."
Create button is not switched with Notifications button.

"Create button is switched with Notifications button.
Note: Enabling this also forcibly hides video ads."

"Disabling this might load more ads from the server.
Also, ads will no longer be blocked in Shorts.
If this setting do not take effect, try switching to Incognito mode."

"Yandex can transcribe videos from any language, but the output is available only in English (en), Russian (ru) and Kazakh (kk). If you enter any other language code or use 'app' (which stands for the app's default language), Gemini will be asked to translate (API key is required)."
Use Yandex transcription instead of Gemini. Yandex is faster and more reliable. No API key is required.
